title: What do you like most about your neighborhood? What could be improved?

korean: 우리 동네에서 제일 좋은 건 조용하고 안전하다는 거야.
밤늦게 혼자 걸어 다녀도 크게 위험한 느낌이 안 들어.
생활 편의 시설들도 가까워서 큰 불편함이 없어.
특히 공원이 가까워서 운동하거나 산책하기 좋아.
먹을 만한 음식점이 별로 없어서 외식하려면 다른 동네로 가야 해.
특히 저녁 늦게까지 여는 식당이 거의 없어.
카페도 별로 없어서 작업하거나 공부할 공간이 부족해.
그리고 주차 공간이 부족해서 차 있는 사람들은 불편해하더라고.
대중교통은 괜찮은데, 막차 시간이 좀 빨라서 아쉬워.
전체적으로는 만족하지만, 몇 가지 개선되면 더 좋을 것 같아.
english: What I like most about my neighborhood is that it's quiet and safe.
Even if I walk alone late at night, I don't really feel, like, it's dangerous.
People are also kind, and the atmosphere is generally peaceful.
Living convenience facilities are also close, so there's no major inconvenience.
Especially the park is close, so it's good for exercising or walking.
But there are also some regrettable points.
There aren't many good restaurants, so if I want to eat out, I have to go to another neighborhood.
Especially there are hardly any restaurants open late in the evening.
There aren't many cafés either, so there's, you know, a lack of space to work or study.
And parking space is insufficient, so people with cars find it inconvenient.
Public transportation is okay, but the last train time is a bit early, which is regretful.
Overall, I'm satisfied, but it would be better if a few things were improved.
